all_findings.title: Missing Access Control on Minting Function
all_findings.description: Function `mint()` is minting without access control modifiers. Any caller can invoke this function. NFTBTC C001/H001/H002: Add onlyOwner, onlyAdmin, or role-based access control.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add modifier to function declaration: `function mint(...) external onlyOwner {...}`

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Missing Access Control on Burning Function
all_findings.description: Function `burn()` is burning without access control modifiers. Any caller can invoke this function. NFTBTC C001/H001/H002: Add onlyOwner, onlyAdmin, or role-based access control.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add modifier to function declaration: `function burn(...) external onlyOwner {...}`

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Unlimited minting possible
all_findings.description: Mint function at line 11 has no supply cap

evidence.recommendation: Implement maximum supply cap

all_findings.title: Liquidity provision without minimum check
all_findings.description: Liquidity addition at line 11 lacks minimum amount validation

evidence.recommendation: Add minimum liquidity requirement to prevent dust attacks

all_findings.title: Liquidity provision without minimum check
all_findings.description: Liquidity addition at line 12 lacks minimum amount validation

evidence.recommendation: Add minimum liquidity requirement to prevent dust attacks

all_findings.title: Missing nonReentrant Modifier on mint()
all_findings.description: Function makes external calls or transfers ETH but lacks nonReentrant modifier. External calls: 0, ETH transfers: 0. This function should have reentrancy protection.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add `nonReentrant` modifier from OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard. Import: `import '@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol';` Usage: `function mint(...) external nonReentrant { ... }`

attack_vectors.description: Reentrancy vulnerability combined with fund transfer
